verses.content: “In unauhai bâwngchal ama- nih, an berâm amanih in- hmang chu in hmuin in tosan el ding a ni nawh a, in unauhai ina chun in ṭhuoipêk ngei ding a nih.

Chun, in unauhai chu in kâwl hnaia um an ni nawh a, a neitu chu in hriet naw amanih a ni chun, in in tieng ṭhuoi el in ta, in kuomah um zing a ta, in unauin a hung zawng pha pha in lo pêk nâwk ding a nih.

An sabengtung khawm chuong ang bawk chun in thaw ding a nih, chuong ang bawk chun an silfênhai khawm in thaw ding a nih, chuong ang tak chun in unau thil inhmang in hmu taphawt chu in thaw ding a na, in tobopui el ding a ni nawh.
“In unauhai sabengtung amanih, an bâwngchal amanih, lampuia tlu in hmuin in tosan el ding a ni nawh a, in keithopui ngei ding a nih.
“Nuhmei chun pasal thuomhnaw an inbel ding a ni nawh a, pasalin nuhmei silfên an inbel ding a ni bawk nawh; tukhawm chuong anga thaw chu LALPA in Pathien ngaiin mi tirdakum a nih.
“Lampuia vate bu, thinga manih, hnuoia manih, a te amanih, a tui amanih um, a te amanih, a tui amanih a puiin a awp lai in hmu chun a te chu a pui pumin in lâk ding a ni nawh.
A pui chu insuo ngei ngei ding a nih, a te ruok chu la thei in ta, chuongchun, in ta dingin ṭhâng a ta, dam sâwt in tih.
“In thar in bâwl chun, chutaka chun mi dâm an tla a, in in chu thisen insuona in a hung ni nawna dingin in inchung chu in inhuon ding a nih.
Chun, in grêp huona chun thil chi hni in chîng ding a ni nawh; chuong naw chun, in chi tu le in grêp huona thil rasuok po po chu LALPA chan- puol ni el a tih.
Bâwngchal le sabengtung hnuoi in inlet hmunkhattir ding a ni nawh.
Sahmul le pat khâwng pawl in inbel ding a ni bawk nawh.
“In inthuomna puon chu a hmawr paliah a hmawrkai in inneitir ding a nih.
“Miin nuhmei a nei a, a pâwl zet a, a theida nâwk si a,
‘Hi nuhmei hi ka nei a, ka pâwl a, nunghâk inthieng a nina ka hmu nawh a,’ tia muolphotaka a siem a, a hming a suksiet chun,
nunghâk nu le pa chun kul kawtkhârah chu khaw upahai kuom- ah nunghâk inthieng a nina chu an hung suklang ding a nih.
Nunghâk pa chun upahai kuom- ah, ‘Hi mi hi ka naunu kân neitir a, amiruokchu, a hnâm nâwk sih a; ngai ta,
I naunu hi nunghâk inthieng a nina ka hmu nawh, tiin muolpho- takin a siem a, nisienlakhawm, hieng hi ka naunu chu nunghâk inthieng a nina chu annâwm,’ tîng a ta.
Chuongchun, chu khaw upahai hmaa chun puon chu phâng an ta. Chu khaw upahai chun ama chu ṭhuoi an ta, hrem an ta.
Israel nunghâk inthieng a suk- hmingsiet leiin tangka shekel za in- chawitir an ta, nunghâk pa chu an pêk ding a nih; ama chu a nuhmei nîng a ta, a dam sûngin ṭhe thei naw nih.
Amiruokchu, chu thu chu a lo indik a, nunghâk chu nunghâk in- thieng a nina ân lang naw chun,

nunghâk chu a pa kawtkhâra chun ṭhuoi suok an ta, a umna khuoa mihai chun lungin dêng hlum an tih, a pa ina nawchizawra Israelhai laia thil suol invêtthlâktak el a thaw lei chun chuong ang chun nangni laia inthawkin thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih.
“Miin pasal nei nuhmei a zâlpui hmu a ni chun, an pahni chun an thi ding a nih, a zâlpuitu pasal le nuhmei chu; chuong ang chun Israelhai laia inthawkin thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih.
“Nunghâk inthieng, mi nuhmei huol, miin khuoah a hmuh a, a zâlpui chun,

an pahniin khaw kul kawt- khârah ṭhuoi suok in ta, lungin in dêng hlum ding a nih; nuhmei chu khuoa um si a, a khêk naw leiin; pasal chu a tuolbâwm nuhmei a sukhming- siet leiin; chuong ang chun nangni laia inthawkin thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih.
“Amiruokchu, miin ramhnuoiah nunghâk, mi ihuol a hmuh a, a manlui a, a zâlpui chun a zâlpuitu pasal chau chu sukhlum ding a na,
a nunghâk chu iengkhawm law ding a ni nawh, nunghâk chunga chun thina khawp suol a um nawh; hieng ang hi chu mi a tuolbâwm thawh a, that ang a na;
ramah a va tâwk fûk a, mi ihuol nunghâk chu a khêk a, santu an um si nawh a.
“Miin nunghâk inthieng huol lo a hmu a, a man a, a zâlpui an hmu chun,
a zâlpuitu pasal chun nunghâk pa chu tangka shekel sâwmnga a pêk ding a nih; chun, ama chu a nuhmei nîng a ta, a sukhmingsiet ta leiin; a dam sûngin ṭhe thei naw nih.
Miin a pa nuhmei zâlpuiin a pa a sukmuolpho ding a ni nawh.
